help-file.title: "DRAGON DISCIPLE"
help-file.content:
A monk specialized in the Way of the Dragon is usually referred to as a Dragon Disciple. They focus on abilities derived of the power and might of the ancient dragons. The abilities of the followers of the this path manifest themselves in four different ways.
Innates --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Mind of Dragon
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Enhanced springleap 46th level: Fist of Dragon 51st level: Enhanced heroism
